column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi E N. - Thanks for your review. I'm sorry you did not enjoy our ramen. We appreciate your feedback
column2: and in the spirit of being constructive
column3: may I ask if there was anything in particular you found lacking in our ramen?Based on your profile photo
column4: I presume you are a chef
column5: so your opinion is especially valued.
